capabilities.description: Paperless-ngx is able to chown files.
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Paperless-ngx is able to bypass permission checks.
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Paperless-ngx is able bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Paperless-ngx is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Paperless-ngx is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.
capabilities.name: SETUID

attrs.label: Automatic Permissions
attrs.description:
Automatically set permissions for the host path.
Enabling this, will check the top level directory,</br>
If it finds incorrect permissions, it will `chown` the
host path to the user and group required for the
postgres container.

attrs.label: Type

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to as a volume.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.1.7.readme:
Paperless-ngx

Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper.
